name: Introduction to Economics
description: This course introduces students to the basics of economics, including microeconomic and macroeconomic theory.

name: Intermediate Microeconomics
description: This course builds on the principles learned in Introduction to Economics by delving deeper into the microeconomic theory.

name: Intermediate Macroeconomics
description: This course builds on the principles learned in Introduction to Economics by delving deeper into the macroeconomic theory.

name: Econometrics
description: This course introduces students to the application of statistical methods to economics.

name: Agricultural Economics
description: This course focuses on the application of economic theory to the agricultural sector.
